ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Re: Bard% was (Patch message)
ygData.msgSnippet: used it for 2 or 3 levels, if i died, and it was night...then i got tired of twisting to run from fv to
ygData.messageBody:
used it for 2 or 3 levels, if i died, and it was night...then i got tired of
twisting to run from fv to <insert very bad place to be doing naked CR for a
20's bard here>. So, I took a trip to LGuk, got my mask...and
oh...wait...i'm dead, mask is on body...i'm human...it's dark...*sigh* time
to twist again...

MacGrough Mich'Rathe
35th Human Bard
Solusek Ro Blood Tide

----- Original Message -----
From: "Jeffrey Sue" <jsue@...>
To: <eqbards@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, February 27, 2001 12:19 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Bard% was (Patch message)


> At 12:59 PM 2/27/01 -0500, you wrote:
> >i have never used concord once. never. it is useless.
>
> that would have been a correct statement if you had added ''to me'' at the
> end of ''it is useless''. if you were a human bard without a dark elf
mask,
> i believe you would find it very useful.
>
> Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
>
> Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to http://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/
>
>
